attributes.additional_details: That the "Farce" called PM question time on Wednesdays be a properly conducted in an orderly and democratic manner not as is now "How to dodge anwsering the question". That the house be up dated with electronic voting system were the MP can push a button to register his vote, not in out through left or right doors taking upwards of 1/2hr to register.If Scotland can and the Welsh can have modern facilities why not then our MP's.
